description: Cloud computing provides amazing capabilities for the modern application, but there are many pitfalls to be aware of - scalability, resilience, elasticity, security and more. In this session we will look at basic must-know patterns when architecting for the Azure cloud: Message-Oriented, Poison Messages, CDN, Priority Queues, Retry Patterns and more.
